DOC.brief_title: Prospective Study Measure Vascular Parameters ( Ancillary Study ADEQUATE )
DOC.criteria: Age 18 et 70 year Patient accept give write informed consent Recipients first renal allograft ( deceased living , non HLA identical donor compatible ABO blood type ) Randomized ADEQUATE study Patients must J112 +/ 3 day stable renal function ( MDRD 4 ) absence DSA since transplantation . Negative T crossmatch cytotoxicity Tolerate daily dose MMF 1g Acute rejection first month Existence BK infection since M3 Proteinuria/reatininuria ratio > 1g/g since M3
